contributory negligence.translation[0].d: failure to take enough care to avoid or prevent an accident, so that you are partly responsible for any loss or damage caused
contributory negligence.translation[1].d: when the injuries suffered by someone were partly caused by their own carelessness. A court can reduce the amount of DAMAGES which an injured person receives if the accident involved contributory negligence
